channel.title: CVE Feed for Trellix -- Trellix Endpoint Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trellix -- Trellix Endpoint Security

item.title: CVE-2023-3665|2024-08-02T07:01:57.407Z -- trellix -- trellix%20endpoint%20security
item.description: A code injection vulnerability in Trellix ENS 10.7.0 April 2023 release and earlier, allowed a local user to disable the ENS AMSI component via environment variables, leading to denial of service and or the execution of arbitrary code.
